summary.span: 表示手寫筆筆尖圖案近似橢圓型。

span.span: Represents a stylus tip shaped like an ellipse.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立並將它傳遞給方法，以清除部分。The following example demonstrates how to create an and pass it to the method to erase a portion of a . 這個範例假設有名`eraseTester`且其事件已連線至在此範例中所定義的事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a called `eraseTester` and that its event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example. 若要建立可讓使用者清除的筆墨控制項，請參閱[如何： 清除自訂控制項上的筆墨](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)。To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
